attributes.action: divert further resources and central government support to the effort to identify and punish violent football hooligans who attended the recent game in Manchester and disgraced themsleves and this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thuggish football fans rioted in Manchester, brutally assaulted police officers, damaged the host city and behaved like animals. That kind of behaviour must not be allowed to go un-answered by civilised society. Central government support must be lent to the effort to identify and prosecute as many of the yobs who took part in this violence as possible, and a strong message sent to football hooligans that the authorities will catch up with you if you break the law.
